attributes.action: come round mine for a nice cup of tea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i hereby invite mr Blair to pop round my house any time he wishes for a nice cup of tea or coffee and a slice of homemade sponge cake. lots of politics  to be discussed at all  times.perhaps i can suggest a soluion to the problems he faces once he leaves office, perhaps he would like to retrain as a plumber,everyone is at it, plumbers make 70k a year!
should mr blair wish to take me up on my offer have his people email my people as soon as possible. i await your email with much trepidation

rejection.details: If you wish to contact the Prime Minister directly then the methods for doing so can be found at http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page3.asp This is not an issue you need a petition to collect signatures for.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
